Bahaya! Turis Menantang Maut di Dekat Geyser Mendidih
06 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Wahyu Setyo Widodo


Foto: Turis di Taman Nasional Yellowstone (dok. KRTV)

Wyoming - Aksi dua turis di Amrik ini sungguh tak patut ditiru. Mereka berdiri terlalu dekat dengan geyser yang kapan saja bisa menyemburkan air mendidih bersuhu 177 derajat celcius.Dua orang turis laki-laki yang tidak diketahui identitasnya itu ditahan oleh pihak Taman Nasional Yellowstone di Wyoming, Amerika Serikat. Penahanan tersebut menyusul tindakan berbahaya yang dilakukan mereka: berdiri di dekat geyser dan asyik foto-foto di sana.Dikumpulkan dari beberapa sumber, Selasa (5/11/2019), aksi kedua turis tidak bertanggung jawab itu tertangkap oleh kamera salah seorang traveler. Salah satu saksi mata, Kimberly Guilliams, pun menceritakan peristiwa itu."Keluarga saya tidak percaya dengan apa yang terjadi. Mereka jelas tidak peduli dan kami tidak percaya bahwa mereka menganggap hal itu baik-baik saja," kata Kimberly seperti dikutip dari KRTV.


Foto: (dok. KRTV)

Padahal, menurut Kimberly, tanda peringatan 'No Tresspassing' alias Dilarang Melintas sudah dipasang di sepanjang jalan dan di sekitar Geyser Old Faithful. Kimberly tidak habis pikir mengapa ada turis-turis yang tidak bertanggung jawab seperti itu."Di sekitar geyser, sudah ada aturan yang menyebut bahwa tindakan itu sangat berbahaya. Tanahnya juga tidak stabil dan sangat rapuh," lanjut Kimberly.Kedua turis ini akhirnya ditahan dan rencananya dibawa ke pengadilan bulan Desember nanti. Jangan coba-coba menirunya ya traveler! Danger! Tourists Challenge Death near Boiling Geysers
06 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Wahyu Setyo Widodo


Photo: Tourists in Yellowstone National Park (doc. KRTV)

Wyoming - The action of two tourists in America is truly not worth emulating. They stood too close to the geysers who could spray boiling water at 177 degrees Celsius at any time. Two male tourists who were not identified were arrested by the Yellowstone National Park in Wyoming, United States. The detention followed a dangerous action they did: standing near the geyser and engrossed in photographs there. Collected from several sources on Tuesday (11/5/2019), the action of the two irresponsible tourists was caught by the camera of a traveler. One eyewitness, Kimberly Guilliams, also told the incident. "My family does not believe what happened. They clearly do not care and we do not believe that they think it is okay," Kimberly was quoted as saying by KRTV.


Photo: (doc. KRTV)

In fact, according to Kimberly, the warning sign 'No Tresspassing' alias has been installed along the road and around the Old Faithful Geyser. Kimberly can't understand why there are irresponsible tourists like that. "Around the geysers, there are rules that say that the action is very dangerous. The land is also unstable and very fragile," Kimberly continued. the plan is to be brought to justice in December. Don't try to copy it traveler!
